title: B = land rate per sq
clause_text: B = land rate per sq. m as per the Annual Statement of Rates (ASR) prepared by the Inspector General of Registration for the year in which construction of amenity is commenced. BUA = Built up area of constructed/developed amenity.
section: Construction Amenity TDR in sq.m. = A/B * 1.5* BUA

source_pdf.text_snippet: B = land rate per sq. m as per the Annual Statement of Rates (ASR) prepared by the Inspector General of Registration for the year in which construction of amenity is commenced.
